channel.title: Mohamed Karim Ben Boubaker
channel.description: Recent content on Mohamed Karim Ben Boubaker

item.title: PLAN-AND-ACT: New blueprint for building more capable and reliable AI agents
item.description: PLAN-AND-ACT is a novel AI agent architecture that significantly improves performance in complex, goal-directed tasks on the web by separating high-level planning from low-level execution and training both components with an innovative reverse-engineered synthetic data pipeline.

item.title: Understanding AI Coding Agents: Architectures, Challenges, and Future Scope
item.description: AI coding assistants enhance productivity by suggesting improvements, while AI coding agents aim for higher autonomy by reasoning about complex problems
